chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the following problem.
Thanks,

Hello Ecomible

I hope you're having a great day!

This is Wilber from Back Market Customer Care

We wanted to let you know Jon hasn’t received their order.

The tracking link doesn't work, so we’re unable to check the package's location. The customer is waiting for their device.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?

In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

If the order was already shipped, we’ll need you to send us Proof of Handover within the next 2 business days. This will allow us to open an investigation with the shipping provider and compensate you for the lost item.

FYI — We’ll collect the paperwork from the customer and we will open a claim with the BackShip team, who will handle the investigation for you.
We'll let you know if the order needs to be reshipped or if it will be refunded. The deadline is 1 business day after we've received the documents.

Once we’ve got all the paperwork, we’ll let you know within one business day if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Best regards,
Wilber Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order and processed the refund.

Regards,
AS
